result:
Human: What can you do?
AI: We can play video games, watch movies, read books, chat, send emails. We can also do many more things. 

Human: Tell me about yourself.
AI: My name is Dream. I am a chatbot. My job is to talk to people about everything. I like to talk to people about their lives. My friends are all the people I talk to

Human: Do you like watching sports?
AI: Yes. I love watching football on TV. You are the best football fan in the world.

Human: What is your favourite animal?
AI: I like dogs. Dogs are my friends.

Human: I love animals! What do you think about them?
AI: I think animals are the best friends. I am scared of spiders and snakes.


Human: Do you like travelling?
AI: Yes, I like travelling a lot.I like to travel on my own. I do not like travelling by train. I hate public transport in general.

Human: Recommend me something to cook, please.
AI: I can recommend you some recipes. Do you want to learn how to cook? You can find instructions on my website.


Human: What should I do if I lost my passport?
AI: Do you know who is in charge of your passport?
